SELECT [Area],
       COUNT(m.idcom) nContrati,
       CASE
           WHEN m.[tipoNegativoRimando] = 1
           THEN 'Negativo'
           ELSE 'Rimando'
       END AS Esito
FROM
(
    SELECT [codPsi],
           [idCom],
           [negat_data],
           [negat_operatore],
           [area],
           [tipoNegativoRimando]
    FROM [servizi].[dbo].[SICOMA_ClientiNegativi]
    WHERE idcom IN(32371, 714427, 714168, 714221, 697550, 714194, 714131, 714226, 714142, 714143, 714127, 714223, 714106, 714121, 714250, 714164, 714097, 697559, 714101, 714186, 714132, 714123, 713010, 713051, 713037, 714181, 714161, 714150, 712986, 713007, 713024, 713022, 714084, 713080, 713081, 714045, 712995, 713018, 714090, 697151, 712963, 714173, 712969, 714087, 712992, 712953, 712987, 714202, 712965, 712916, 712930, 714282, 712959, 712960, 714219, 712914, 712909, 714082, 712918, 712951, 714125, 712853, 714213, 53682, 712862, 713061, 48073, 683187, 696941, 617028, 669461, 712942, 697158, 714218, 682940, 669366, 670049, 712871, 712778, 712780, 712915, 712917, 712829, 712949, 712893, 712891, 712956, 714922, 714152, 714080, 712812, 714285, 712898, 475148, 713008, 696985, 712928, 714188, 712877, 712881, 696882, 712825, 712907, 713013, 712851, 712772, 712894, 697573, 712954, 712801, 712836, 712835, 696870, 714109, 712789, 697066, 714088, 714091, 712783, 712776, 697234, 712866, 712799, 712857, 712927, 712868, 712764, 712766, 712797, 712759, 712889, 697635, 712713, 697131, 697462, 696972, 712740, 712741, 712721, 696873, 712736, 712735, 712782, 712784, 712901, 712872, 712742, 712809, 712768, 712699, 712884, 712817, 712710, 712687, 712715, 712865, 712720, 712806, 712672, 714279, 712955, 712958, 669369, 695348, 712641, 712813, 712815, 669582, 655338, 655760, 712649, 712696, 655772, 655766, 655292, 3379, 712618, 682860, 712604, 712852, 696803, 712571, 712952, 712569, 712885, 712886, 712549, 712581, 712755, 712607, 712611, 696657, 712603, 712645, 712781, 712558, 712559, 712542, 712599, 712688, 712538, 51778, 712567, 712572, 712553, 714092, 712634, 712650, 712647, 712503, 712748, 712749, 712663, 712661, 712636, 712532, 712557, 712509, 712516, 712583, 712511, 712676, 712440, 712444, 712482, 712458, 712522, 712451, 712461, 712443, 712389, 712513, 712628, 712658, 712595, 712400, 712434, 712474, 712427, 714196, 712529, 714155, 682569, 714257, 671751, 712518, 718764, 712435, 712413, 712283, 712371, 712346, 712301, 712300, 696564, 712310, 712279, 712295, 712367, 712368, 19355, 712330, 712416, 714153, 712305, 712302, 671500, 712327, 655095, 542385, 712281, 712433, 712485, 712274, 712744, 712224, 712225, 712358, 712306, 654916, 712285, 712660, 669072, 712245, 712329, 712525, 712269, 712409, 712370, 712294, 712237, 551521, 668660, 668651, 712254, 712244, 712234, 714162, 712248, 712883, 598331, 712466, 327215, 536279, 712241, 712243, 712246, 712291, 712251)
) m
GROUP BY area,
         tipoNegativoRimando
ORDER BY Area;
